gangon smiled..then looked down below the water and saw something flash..he
reached down and grabbed it....it was some weird device... "this something
of yours?..." he asked......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 8:38 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ( BB: I've been sick yesterday and a bit of the day before. I'm all caught
> up now.)
>
> BrightBlade, Rage
>
> * BrightBlade put up her arms in front of her face as the water from
> Gangon's splash down suddenly swamped her, she yelled when the cold water
> fell against her.
> She then put her arms down and looked at her soaked body, her fur was wet
> and stuck right against her body showing every line and curve.
> She narrowed her optics and looked over at Gangon.*
>
> " You DITZ!"
>
> * BrightBlade looked at her hand and the water dripping off of it, she
then
> looked over at Gangon and a sly smile suddenly came across her lips.
> With one swift move she slapped her hands into the water causing a shower
of
> cold liquid to head straight for Gangon, she splashed him.*
>
> " Ha! Take THAT!"
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> * Rage dismissed the battle that was around her and concentrated on the
> smell of fowl that seemed to be getting further and further away, she then
> began to follow the sent into the forest and leave Scourge behind.
> The sent was fresh and no that hard to follow, there was a second smell
but
> it was a raptor and she knew not to deal with them.
> It wasn't long before Rage came within 100 metres of her target, the fowl
in
> which she was smelling was directly ahead of her. She then went down to
all
> fours as she had when she was hunting those two raptors and began to stalk
> towards the smell, supper might be soon!*
>
